channel.title: Mac Errors :( NEED HELP!
channel.description: Okay soo when i start up the server and start up hackzoors amazingly good client for macs :) i log in to the server and i would walk there would be no problem then i walk again and this comes up Invalid memory access of location 0x0 rip=0x1010ff128 like i would click to walk up then i would click again then it would freeze

item.title: Mac Errors :( NEED HELP!
item.dc:creator: @wavemaker wavemaker
item.description:
@wavemaker wrote:

or you can just change your run.bash file (if you made one) so its like this:

java -d32 -Xmx512m client 10 0 highmem members 32

that is for galkons ref, but should work for all. the main thing is that you should always put -d32 infront of everything besides java because than it will run your 32bit java not 64 bit.

or do it ranellie’s way.

Read full topic

item.title: Mac Errors :( NEED HELP!
item.dc:creator: @ryanellie_01 ryanellie 01
item.description:
@ryanellie_01 wrote:

It’s because your running on 64 bit java you need to change it to 32 bit java. To do that go to your blue search bar in the corner type in java prefrences. Hit enter. Then open up java prefrences the change where it says 64 bit change it to 32 bit. Then you should be good tell me if you get any problems.

Read full topic

item.title: Mac Errors :( NEED HELP!
item.dc:creator: @laurent_248 laurent 248
item.description:
@laurent_248 wrote:

Mac is the best but not for RSPS. All the batch and the paths are for windows, and the Mac clients doesn’t work on all servers.

Read full topic
